benchmark_details.name: TutorQA
benchmark_details.overview: TutorQA is a QA benchmark featuring six diverse tasks and comprising 1,200 expert-verified, NLP-centric QA pairs designed to mimic college-level tutoring questions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a comprehensive evaluation benchmark for graph reasoning and question answering in the NLP domain.

data.source: Expert-verified QA pairs specific to NLP education.

methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on human expert evaluations and predefined criteria.
methodology.interpretation: High scores indicate strong performance in answering questions specifically and accurately.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: All data is expert-verified to ensure the absence of harmful or private information.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.compliance_with_regulations: The study adheres to established ethical norms in AI research.
